result.execSummary:
The defendant Bobby T Owens was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bobby T Owens

records.addlTxt: Reminder Notice indicating amount due mailed to defendant.

10:52 AM case 22CM582, 22CM408, 22TR5022 called. Prosecuting Attorney Robert W. Stoiber in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Bobby T Owens not in court.  Attorney Erika Amundson in court for Bobby T Owens. Agreement has been reached. State in compliance with victim notification requirements. 
State moves to amend Count 1 in 22CM408 to County Ordinance Disorderly Conduct and to default the Defendant in 22TR5022: OWI 1st. Defense agrees to amendment. 

Court orders Count 1 in 22CM408 amended to County Disorderly Conduct and defaults for costs only. Court defaults Defendant in 22TR5022 and orders $811.50, blood draw fee, 6 month driver's license revocation, AODA and follow through with recommendations. Remaining charges are dismissed and read in including 22CM582.

9:49 AM cases 22CM408, 22CM582 called. Prosecuting Attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Bobby T Owens not in court.  Attorney Erika Amundson in court for Bobby T Owens. Attorney Amundson has no information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance.
Hearing scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:35 AM Judge Michael Schumacher for Branch 4 Intake. Prosecuting attorney Tiffany M. Winter in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Bobby T Owens does not appear.  Attorney Erika Amundson in court for Bobby T Owens.
Hearing on no contact order scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Notice of Hearing - Return to Sender, Attempted Not Known, Unable to Forward
